description: Samples of materials pursuant to condition 3 of planning permission ref. PP/2013/5502 dated 13/02/2014 for Change of Use of first and second-floors of building from office (B1a use class) to residential (C3 Use Class) Roof extension to rear (main) roofslope; rear roof extension to rear outrigger roofslope and installation of seven rooflights to rear roofslope (including outrigger roofslope); restoration/alteration of front and rear fatade incorporating additional windows to side elevation at first and second floor level and reconfiguration of rear side window at first floor level, reconfiguration and installation of five new windows at rear elevation incorporating  Internal and external alteration and conversion of first and second floor office space into seven residential units (1 x studio, 5 x 1bed and 1 x 2 bed flats) and refuse storage
